title: is there any way i can quickly get a 24 hour credit card max out removed?
body:
it bugged hardcore earlier and decided to max attempts me after only 1 purchase
help pls?

replies.body:
Nope, there's no way we can override that lockout period, as it's put in place for security reasons. You'll need to wait **exactly 24 hours** before you make another **attempt** at making the purchase. If you try too early, it resets the clock and you'll have to wait again.

Let me know if you have any questions.
